name: Word Domination: Going Solo
description:
The Word Domination: Going Solo app is designed to be used with the Word Domination boardgame published by Uproarious Games. You will need a copy of that boardgame in order to take advantage of this app.

Ready to ransack the world's treasures... without the hassle of other players to get in your way? In Word Domination: Going Solo, you play through five rounds - with each round representing the final turn of a game of Word Domination. After each round, you tally your score. After five rounds, you compare your score to determine just how villainous you truly are.

There are four different board sizes to play against - allowing you experience a game with the freedom to expand or a game that is already mostly locked down. Word Domination: Going Solo also allows you to share the unique random key of your game with your friends, allowing you to compete for high score in the same game. Yes - it's a solo game that you can play with your friends!
